name: Goro 2
description:
Goro 2 is the second part of the warmly accepted "Goro" with the preservation of a peaceful atmosphere, a variety of levels and beautiful music. This casual game will give you a nice feeling from passing each obstacle to the melodic transfusion of notes written specifically for this game. Abstract minimalistic graphics do not bother you, but give you scope for focusing on the main goal - going forward. Individuality levels will not let you get bored. Try it - you will get pleasant emotions that the developer of this game wanted to awaken in you.

Features:

Relaxing gameplay

Pleasant music

Beautiful graphics

Interesting levels
